arts.ttl: Spurs and Chelsea target ‘makes decision’ over long-term future
arts.sum: Eric Garcia's reported contract decision at Barcelona will impact Chelsea and Tottenham Hotspur's long-term plans in the centre-back market.

arts.ttl: Tottenham predicted lineup vs Chelsea: Surprise Romero return?
arts.sum: A huge London derby is on the horizon for Thomas Frank's Spurs.

arts.ttl: Frank confirms double Tottenham injury boost ahead of Chelsea clash
arts.sum: Ahead of Tottenham Hotspur's Premier League clash against Chelsea, Thomas Frank has confirmed that Cristian Romero and Destiny Udogie are available for selection.

arts.ttl: Chelsea Predicted Lineup vs. Tottenham: Key Players Recalled for Derby
arts.sum: Enzo Maresca rested several key players ahead of Saturday’s London derby.

arts.ttl: Barcelona star was wanted by Chelsea & Tottenham over the summer
arts.sum: Two of the Premier League’s leading clubs set their sights on the signature of Barcelona star Eric García during the summer transfer window. Both, however, were ultimately forced to abandon…

arts.ttl: Premier League fixture changes for late December and early January
arts.sum: See the revised schedule as matches including Arsenal v Liverpool are moved for live TV coverage

arts.ttl: Enzo Maresca addresses the set-piece threat of Tottenham
arts.sum: They started very good this season and also because it's a derby for sure it would be a difficult game. “I think that set-pieces you are going to score goals and you are going to concede goals.

arts.ttl: John Terry Slams Spurs After Jamie O'Hara's 'Ridiculous' Chelsea Claim
arts.sum: Chelsea legend John Terry brutally tears apart Tottenham after a 'ridiculous' claim from pundit Jamie O'Hara.

arts.ttl: John Terry adds spice to Chelsea's derby at Tottenham by claiming he will arrive at the game one minute before kick-off - as it takes just 60 SECONDS to look around rival's trophy cabinet
arts.sum: The Blues legend made a brutal joke at the expense of Tottenham's trophy cabinet, which had its first addition in 17 years when they won the Europa League last season.

arts.ttl: Enzo Maresca confirms Chelsea team news for Tottenham
arts.sum: Enzo Maresca has confirmed that Moises Caicedo, Enzo Fernandez and Joao Pedro are all available for tomorrow evening's trip to Tottenham Hotspur. Joao Pedro didn't feature at Molineux as he continues to be managed by the Blues coaching staff.
